content.detailedDescription: I was on aol today, and one of the pages had a ge "ecomagination" long commercial running.  in the scene where the young man is on the beach and a parasail is floating behind him in the background, a white cigar shaped object moves quickly right to left in the background.  the particular scene only lasts about five seconds, and the object appears on screen for about one second.
content.summary: A ufo appears in the background of a ge ecomagination commercial

content.detailedDescription:
On march 25, 2006, at 9:30am i was driving my car and was headed ese. i had left my home at 9:25am and it took me about five minutes to get to the location where i observed the large, about 25'-30', round black circle hovering above the trees. it was about 1/4 mile from my observation point.
i was leaving my subdivision and the street i was driving on makes several curves before it reaches the main n/s street, 72nd street. i spotted the object as i was about to drive around the last curve, the sighting was no more that 5-6 seconds. however, during that time period i could see that the object was not moving relative to the trees. since it was march the trees were just starting to bud and i could see through the tees and observed the roofs of several homes, so i knew that the object was east of 72nd street where the homes were located. the object was about 20'-30' above the trees, which were 5'-10' taller than the homes. the wind was about 10-15mph, however, i didn't see the object moving relative to the homes or trees. the object was not a weather balloon, airplain, helicopter, hot air balloon, and i didn't see anything that looked like a teather attached to the object. it should also be noted that about 100 yrds to the north there is a power sub-station the furnishes electricty to about 1/3 of the city of lavista, about 1000 homes.

after i rounded the curve the object was gone. i didn't make any attempt to try to locate it. i later contacted the lavista police department & the faa. the spokeperson for the police department said that there had been no calls about the object.  the faa spokesperson said that no such object had been sighted or seen on their radar.
content.summary: Sighted circular black object hovering above the trees.

content.detailedDescription: Call for the story its something i cant explane.
content.summary: The most unexplainable things that i have ever seen !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

content.detailedDescription:
Ufos appeared in photos when downloaded.

the first photo shows a saucer like object on the left edge.  you need to zoom at least 3 or 4 times to see the windows or lights on the side/front.

the second photo shows a saucer like object on the right top edge.
content.summary: Ufos appeared in photos when downloaded.

content.detailedDescription:
First filming i was watching tv and opened my front door facing the ocean and i noticed a light and starting filming it. i noticed a light over the pacific ocean looking west to northwest and it looked like a airplane or a star but wasnt moving fast and didnt have flashing beacons.  

the next day i shared the footage with my friend chris and he was amazed and i suggested that we look and see if it was there again and to our amazement the light did reappear.I filmed it 2 days april 27 and april 28, the first day was at 9:51pm and the next day around the same time but an hour later. i couldn't decipher the distance because of the darkness at night. 

the object was moving very slowly and progressively moved west to northwest and in the distance i noticed it move extremely fast. at times fading out and reappearing.  

my feelings are iam not sure what the object was or is and wanted document it. 

i lost sight of the object because it went of sight and completely disappeared.
content.summary: Apparently diamond shaped and with occasionally flashing red, slow moving

content.detailedDescription: It hand made a triagle shape and then shot off to the south unlike anyman made aircraft unlike any man made aircraft i have everseen
content.summary: It hand made a triagle shape and then shot off to the south

content.detailedDescription:
Out turkey hunting with a partner around 5:45am. both got out of the vehicle and walked aboput 1/2 mile to get to the bush looked around hydo lines and observed the two objects 4-500 yards away and objects were 
touching each other.  objects were about 20 feet long and about 6 feet high. partner stated he saw windows all along the side of the objects.
reporting wanted to go closer and investigate  but the partner did not.  even though witness had a 10 ga. shot gun. he did not want to go alone. took about 2 hours to travel the distance to the objects and they were gone. one set of footprints only no other gtround trace. partner shot and crippled turkey and was forced to retrieve the bird and in trying to do so observed another person dressed in camo who fled the area.
 
person fled very fast even though dressed in hunting gear. this was a strange action for a fellow hunter.

reporting witness was not fearful but partner was not willing to go any closer to the objects.

after going into the bush for turkey, the objects were not seen again.
content.summary: 20 feet long,tent like, not rounded, squares streched out, silver glow, power lines in the area

content.detailedDescription:
On a hot night in the summer of 1969--i was cooling off on my front porch when i noticed an acorn shaped object(oval)hanging over my house about 150 feet in the air. it was about 20 feet high and 15 feet wide--camouflaged against the dark night sky. no lights at all. definitely trying to hide itself.
i called a couple friends out to the porch and it was so hard to see--that they had to follow my finger as i pointed at the object. we observed it hanging there for about 5 minutes. suddenly the bottom of the craft lit up with a swirling kind of energy source. (if i recall it was red yellow and green) although the sides of the ufo were not lit--the reflection from the bottom lights enabled us to make out portholes that went around the craft.
the ufo hung there--lit up--for about 5 seconds then took off slowly. we could not hear any noise-total silence. it then accelerated at a terrific speed towards malibu,ca and about 30 seconds later--it looked like a star as it grew smaller and disappeared into the northwest sky. it did not disappear behind any mountain--but high in the sky--into the stars.

i called the weather bureau and they had no other report of a ufo. i also  checked the next day papers and nothing was there. i never heard or saw any report about this incident. i never ran into any other person (besides the 3 of us) that witnessed this. this amazes me as it took place in west hollywood,ca--at an early night hour--just a quarter mile from the main section of sunset strip--one of the most populated streets and areas in the country.

have you ever got a similar report about this incident? i wish i could recall the exact date but i cannot.  summer of 1969 is the best i can do.
thanks,
wayne hagstrom
content.summary: I saw a ufo over my house in the summer of 1969. it was dark,no noise--then it lit up and flew towards malibu.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving northbound on mission rd. i noticed a lighted water tower that never existed before. i kind of dismissed it. i looked back at the water tower to ponder it, and as i did it started moving southward very slowly.

when it was next to my driver side door, it curved immediatly to my right and sped up as it traveled past my truck and out of view.

i'm a skeptic...But it was wierd as hell.
content.summary: Triangular lighted object hovered than flew.

content.detailedDescription: Hello. my wife was on her way to work in sullivan gardens coming from bloomingdale. on john b dennis hwy she saw a triangle shaped object below the clouds with lights on 2 ends and a green sqaure in the middle which she said looked like 2 "people" were kind of standing in looking down. she started searching for her camera phone. and turned around at indian path hospital but when she got back across the hill the object had vanished. she called me afterwards pretty upset. she said at first she thought her eyes were playing tricks on her. she was skeptical before this happened. she said it made her feel really wierd and strange and was actually worried that they were watching her. this is a true story. i have no reason nor the time to be on here telling bogus storys. my wife is very concerned and somewhat scared about this incident so if u have similar reports or a debunk could u please email me. thanks. ts from kingsport, tn
content.summary: Triangle, white lights on end green sqaure in middle saw by nonbeliever.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a mufon - wisconsin case.
the witness and her husband were returning to wisconsin from florida aboard a midwest airliners flight when she saw a pair of white lights out the right side window of the aircraft.  the was one small and seemed far away and the other was very bright and large and was very close to the aircraft.  after watching the lights for a few minutes, the small light disappeared.  a few minutes later, the nearby large light switched off.  after about ten minutes, the witness observed another very bright star-like light which began to maneuver and change position. after repeating the maneuvering for several minutes, the light returned to its original position in the sky and resumed looking like a huge star.  the witness lost sight of the light as the aircraft began it's approach to land at milwaukee's general billy mitchell field.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large white light close to airliner

content.detailedDescription:
all i saw were the lights no other image.  but considering the angle of the lights, i figured it to be a circled object.
 
the object did not seem to be moving.  the lights came on and went off in the same location.
 
it was a clear evening.  i saw no stars or any other objects in the sky.  but let me say this,  these lights were very bright.  they were so bright surely someone else had seen them.  i am not sure of the altitude, but i would guess the object was about 100 feet in the air.  
 
how long i viewed it?  well, i stepped outside and the lights caught my attention, i noticed 2 lights close together. i don���t know how long they had been on but they were the 2 lights on the top.    i thought, my gosh those planes are too close they are going to crash.  but also thinking those are some bright lights.  i walked into the grassy area of the yard (about 10 feet) to get a better look and that is when the 3rd light below the 2 on top came on.  i at that second thought "what the heck"  and it was at that point the other 5 lights came on.  i quickly (maybe 5 huge steps) went inside the doorway and yelled for my husband to come quick.  i turned back and looked at the lights and they went out.  unfortunatly my husband did not see it at all.  i stood outside, walked around looking in the sky only to find nothing, not a plane, not a star, not a cloud.  nothing at all was in the sky.
 
these lights were so bright, i am surprised that no one else has mentioned it or that it was not on the news.  i watched the news that evening and in the morning and nothing was mentioned.  nothing in the paper.  has anyone else reported this sighting?  i am not sure of the objects i saw.  but i can surely say that it is something i have never seen before and i have nothing to compare it to.

attached picture of the triangle was not taken by me.  i found it on line and it is very similar if not exact to what i saw.  the second image is the actual location of what i saw.  i used a paint program to draw in the object.  it doesn't give it justice but it offers an idea to the image.
content.summary: Began with 2 lights and then a 3rd came on making a shape of a triangle.  after a couple of seconds a partial circle of five lights came on beneath the triangle.  it seem to make a overall shape of a circle.

content.detailedDescription: On april 17, 2007 at around 3:00 pm the children were outside playing i was prepairing for dinner and doing some dishes. my grandson mick came running in the house asking me to come on outside we see a ufo!!! (he had heard my stories about the ufo's i have seen and many times came in and said i saw a ufo grandma! well this time was different!) he practically pulled me out of the house i knew it was a different reaction from him and knew i had to hurry or it would be gone. as i ran out the door i could see his sisters and three of the neighbor kids pointing into the south eastern sky and exclaiming there it is there it is! i looked and saw nothing then all the sudden i saw it, a gray disc with three round lights or maybe reflective metal at first it was more of a side view the disc would appear and then disappear it seemed as though it would ascend and move over to the left or the right about thirty feet away from where it last appeared and then it would appear and disappear.....It seemed to be playing peek a boo with the kids... i saw it from the underside it was circular and seemed to have five lights around it, or circular reflective metal spots that resembled lights, it had a design on the bottom of it that consisted of what i believed to be five loops, topside of the loop by a light, they seemed to be something moving on the underside the loops maybe. i ran into the house and got our binoculars to get a better look when i came out and put the binoculars to my eyes i amazingly pointed them straight at what looked like the same ufo or another one that was carrying or attached to a long white rectangle that was long ways hanging down, also it seemed to have no shadowy areas and sizewise i thought it to be as big as the quest building ( a high rise) attached to this ufo that looked exactly like the one we were watching , it seemed to me that while i viewed through the binnoculars i could hear the kids saying there it is!! there it is! like they were seeing the same thing they saw before i came out to look and interestingly enough none of them said what is it carrying now! which amaized me also. i don't think they saw that for some reason. the ufo that i saw through the binnoculars that was carrying the white rectangle seemed to be desending and then just disapeared. my impression was that the other ufo the first one the one the kids were watching attached to the bottom of the one i saw in the binnoculars the one with the white rectangle. if so i believed this to be a white spool of thread. i believe it lasted for about 15 minutes that we were out there viewing this sighting.
content.summary: There was a ufo disc shaped it was appearing and disapearing and would reapear about 30 feet from where it appeard and seemed to be assending and dessending i got my binoculars i saw what looked the same but with a huge white rectangle attached underneath

content.detailedDescription: This case is from new york state within 20 miles of the niagara hfalls military base. the witness was with three others (father, sister and a cousin)in 1979 as they sighted a glowing orb-like orange light streaking across the sky in a northeast direction.All felt the object sighting was not was not a military craft.It appears that two military jets were scrambled within a minute of the sighting and took off in the direction of the object. all four witnesses felt the jets were following the object. they followed the object with the father doing the best he could to keep up until the objects and the jets were out of sight. the sighting was of short duration. even 28 years later the sighting will come up as the family discusses other events like the phoenix sighting. the witness has not answered any e-mails nor made attempts to contact us to discuss this any further.
content.summary: 1979 multiple witness sighting  near niagara falls area

content.detailedDescription: On august 16, 2006 3 witnesses in a boat sighted an object while boating in lake erie near angola ny. the object appeared to be a diamond shaped multi colored object just above the horizon over the canadian border a good distance away from angola. as they got further out they shut the boat off and drifted.Two of the witnesse laid back & looked into the night skies claiming they saw shooting stars. the witness i spoke to said he didn't see the shooting stars (the other two did). he saw a star like diamond shaped object come out of the water near the canandian border and ascend into the night sky. he told the two friends where to look for the diamond shaped bright object heading into the ebvening sky when the object appeared to ascend and disappeared in a flash like a car speeding off into the horizon. the three men were in awe of the event. they went home directly after the sighting and took the boat out of the lake. one witness sat there open mouthed in dis-belief after the sighting. the witness i spoke to-the only one i have been able to establish contact with (and this took some doing on my part) has stated they don't talk about the event between them and one of the men-the youngest they have had no contact with. the witness said his two friends to his knowledge seemed ok but he has had some things to deal with. i  have been unable to get the other two witnesses to speak to me regarding the sighting to date. after the sighting the witness claims to have been very "moved" by the event. he had trouble sleeping for several months with loss of concentration and focus on his normal daily activities. he said he was sick and lethargic after the incident. was dizzy, and had loss of equilibrium and balance. he went to see a doctor for colds and ear problems. he said he is stabilizing and that was 3 months after the sighting. additional comments on my end-august is the time of the perseid meteor showers and they may have seen a few shooting stars around this time. the after affects of the sighting could be a combination of both physiological and psychological-both mental & physical effects .I found it interesting that they built a huge bonfire before taking the boat ride. could have been a nice signal that says "here we are" as they leave the dock and head into lake erie. he has also experienced computer, radio and streetlights that shut off in his presence. i will try to follow up on this interesting case more if the witness is willing to continue dialogue. many additional questions here as to what caused the physiological effects the witness speaks of.
content.summary: Multiple witness sighting of a diamond shaped object august 2006 over lake erie from angola ny

content.detailedDescription: In 1991 this witness sighted an object which appeared to be the size of venus in the early evening skies over western new york and possibly as far as virginia. the object was bright and travelling in a spiraling outward motion. it was not venus. it was circular/spherical. it was bright but the witness clearly stated it was not star like nor was it venus. the object was first sighted in the south and flew in a norrteast direction.They are not sure of the year or season since approximately 16-17 years passed since the sighting. the witness said they thought there was something in the papers about the object. the newspaper is unknown. they said it was not a "japanese rocket/ satellite". the witness said the light diffused after awhile. it was the odd spiraling motion of the object which caught their eye. the individual has had no prior sightings before or since and no strange dreams or after effects. they have had an interest in the ufo phenomenon because of a great aunt who was interested in the subject back in the 1940's.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 1991 sighting of an object exhiniting a spiraling outward flight.

content.detailedDescription: The witness saw this event 1963-1965. he can't remember the year and says he was 10-12 years old. he was in the car with mother, sister and a friend. they all saw a green fireball. ferry avenue east over the hyde park area. it was low and blue green in the color of its trail. it seemed very hot to him and like something from a flash gordon movie. he said there was a picture in the niagara falls gazette about the sighting. (it will be interesting to see if we can find that news article to corroborrate the date & time of the event) he also said he heard a loud "whoosh" as the object passed them by. he said the object came in low, appeared to hit the atmosphere then "bounce out". his impression is that the object seemed "artificial". he said the picture in the gazette was "a picture with a contrail/fireball ". in the 60's my brother also saw a daytime "comet like event" that took place over the western new york area of scranton ny. ( i was 10-11 & my younger brother 7-9 depending on the year of the sighting. they could be related. i believe that object was also traveling in the same direction as this witness stated. he isn't sure of the time/season of the year the sighting ocurred.
content.summary: 1963-1965 fireball shaped object sighted over niagara falls reported on ny the niagara falls gazette with many witnesses

content.detailedDescription: The event i am reporting occurred from 11:30-11:37 p.M. on the night of april 30th, 2007.  we were in a small clearing between some woods around a development, on a path that leads down to cliffs and a river below that.  we  were returning from sitting at the cliffs and gazing out over into the river, in the sky, etc.  i often look at the night sky because i am interested in ufo phenomenon, and i was leading the group of us (7) back to the car when i  looked up at the moon (which is around 99% full in its phases at the moment). the object was moving right past the moon, moving up like it was gaining altitude and parallel to the moon. i pointed out the object to the group and we all stopped to witness it. my first reaction was that it looked like what a shuttle launch would look like from a distance, but knowing what i do about launches (very little at best, but more than most) i believe launches are earlier in the morning and upon further investigation of nasa's mission schedule i came to under stand there was no mission set for this evening. as i was trying to think of what it could be the object turned away from the moon and began to span the sky in a lateral direction (right to left from our perspective). when it turned there was a glow visible to the object and red lights that flashed on either side, no green.  the contrail that the object left remained completely tight and did not span out like planes i watch over head do, which i also found unusual. the speed at which the object crossed the sky was also out of ordinary, it covered (if you were to hold your arms out at length and look at the space between) a arms span of distance in a shorter time then i usually watch airplanes fly.  as the object moved directly in front of our vantage point, no sound followed, it was completely silent, except for a low hum that could be heard as well as felt. as the craft finished its parallel path across the sky, it took a sharp right (close to 90 degrees) and started to gain altitude again.  the rear of the craft was visible now, and along with the glow and red flashing  the back appeared to glow of blue flame.  still no sound was heard and the object was now moving at a faster pace than before.  the object was lost because it was moving so fast and was getting to far away that it faded to star sized, and looked as if it replaced the position of one star that was fixed in the sky.  although the object faded, the "star-like" glow kept the object in vision until some clouds passed over and it became too overcast to continue watching for it.  my feelings as the object was flying were many.  as it came into view for the first time i tried to think and eliminate terrestrial options for id'ing the craft, but as it passed us and flew out of sight i was struck with wonder, excitement and a small amount of fear about the oddity.  i was even more excited when there were no launches that appeared because that eliminated what i thought to be the most viable option of what it could be.
content.summary: Craft moving fast across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Two brothers aged 14 & 15 at the time in 1969 witnessed two star like objects in the night skies over the niagara falls near the junior high school/hyde park area.They were lying on their back in the snow watching stars in the sky when they both saw two points of light that looked like two moving stars that came toward each other from opposite ends of an east/west sky-stop on a dime as they came very close to each other-(about a minute in duration) hover-then rotate in a circle and take off in different directions. (this is a carbon copy of a ufo sighting i had in september of 1983 in the syracuse area night skies about 4am)the two objects they witnessed were directly overhead as they lay in the snow. the whole sighting took 5-6 minutes in duration. both brothers have since had multiple sightings and both work in security/police related positions. the weather conditions were cold with clear skies. other than the star like quality of the objects they could give no description of them . they heard no sound associated with the sighting.
content.summary: Niagara falls area multiple witness sighting of two objects in 1969

content.detailedDescription:
My name is charlie tyler

i was bon oct 20 1941. i was about 9 years old, at that time.

i remember that day, very well.

it is the day we buried my grandfather.

after the serimonties at the gravesite, we arrive at his home.

i remember his chickens going to roost.

i knew something was strange at that time.

i wasn't very concerned, until i noticed the older people.

they were terrified, some were praying,

when you are 9 years old and see 15 to 20 older people, terrified.

you don't forget that.

to the best of my memory.

it was a clear bright day, no clouds, and no rainstorms.

it was if night was coming on, but a faster pace.

it took about 15 minutes, until it was as dark as midnight.

this dark time lasted about one half hour, then in 15 minutes it was 

back to a normal sunday bright afternoon.

the sky did not turn to any color.

please direct me to other information sites. if you have any.

sincerely ... charlie tyler

http://the-red-thread.Net/sunday.Html
content.summary: Black as midnight at 3:00 pm

content.detailedDescription: While traveling on the highway to visit a friend, i noticed movement in the sky and saw a cylindrical object. i was riding as a passenger, so i had the luxury to watch it travel at a quick, but not impossible speed, for a typical aircraft. its path was a very straight angle from the upper left area of my field of vision toward the lower right, with no obvious deviation. it was broad daylight in a blue sky with sparse, full clouds, so i could see the object quite clearly, with my vision obscured only by distance. since it was quite far and my visual impression of it wasn't perfectly clear, i dismissed it as nothing but a commercial plane, likely a 747 judging by apparent size. i remember noting mentally, though, that it was strange for a jet aircraft to not leave a vapor trail, but also dismissed that, since that's what i saw, and assumed the absence of vapor was due to whatever climate conditions existed locally relative to the object. convinced that it must be mundane, my attention momentarily wandered to focus casually on other scenery, but then i glanced back a few seconds before the object was about to pass in front of the only nearby cloud directly in its course. i was very surprised when the object instead passed behind the cloud, as judging by distance and speed i assumed it was much closer than the cloud, and wouldn't be flying at such a high altitude. my attention was now fixed, and i mentioned it to my friend who was driving. i explained everything in detail, and he watched with me, we were both paying attention, hoping to get another look when it should clear the cloud and emerge on the other side. even though we watched with fixed attention for several minutes, the object never appeared again, seeming to have vanished while behind the cloud. we watched long enough that the cloud (which was drifting gradually in an almost directly opposing course to the object) eventually moved beyond the approximate point in the sky where the object passed behind it, and the cloud had mostly dissipated by that point. both of those factors: the position of the cloud, and its dispersement, meant that we were satisfied that there was no possibility to reestablish visual contact with the object. my friend, the driver of the vehicle, never actually established visual contact with the object, but knows me well enough to know that i didn't fabricate or exaggerate any part of what i told him, so there's no doubt in his mind that i saw exactly what i described. even though there was nothing particularly strange about the object aside from its seemingly unusual shape and the fact that it never emerged from behind the cloud, it left me with a very intense sensation that i can only described as unsettled, and somewhat excited.
content.summary: Light colored cylinder with rounded ends and darkened bands near either end.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving along a road near tysons corner macclain area near the cia.
i was sight seeing along a nice road. when in town i dont have time to sight see. i took time out to look around. found a sign that goes to the cia road. i took that road and after awhile of snapping photos of the area. i found the road was really wooded. i was at the top oof a hill and i felt a very strong presence. i was so powerful. on a scale ooooof 1 -100 most humans feel like a 10-20 this was 80%. i looked doen the hill and saw what appeared to be a huge cat with huge yellow eyes. i had a car behide me so i was unable to stop and look around so i took a snap photo of the cat. the  cat creature was huge. the eyes were over a foot annd they glowed yellow. its head was looking down the road and it pulled off the edge back down the slope of the road as i got close you could still see the cat creature. the eyes were bigger than a foot. i didnt have much time so i got the camera ready and flash snapped it.
i developed iit and forgot all about it till i went looking for my sons iraqi photos and found the virgina road pics. ii found the cat annd realized a alien was on the photo too. it was to the right.
it had a gold helmet. silver neck docking area silver pin area to attach helmet and lock it on. red space suit and a gold traingle and and an eye image in the middle of the tringle. i took the photo but did not see the alien, the leggs are silouted/see thru chest upper torso are there. i didnt see alien until i developed it. i cound not belive the detail but its on the negitive and i had two blown up photos to see better detail
i have shoown a few but i was at staarcon denver a few weeks ago and showed the mufon booth the picture, they man who wanted tooo see it was not there so i showed them told them .1. i was drivinng a road. 2.The presence of something and then yellow cat eyes.3 a giant cat over 15'
my feelings was overpowering from the strong presence of the cat now noot sure iiiiiif it was cat ooor alien oor both. took photo forgot about picture. lasted roughly 45 secs or so
content.summary: Creature photo later alien in pic found

content.detailedDescription: It was a summer night around 11pm, in kissimmee florida was with my brother,and his girlfriend.We went out to the gas station,and on the way back home.We were driving on florida parkway when all of a sudden my brother slammed on the breaks. about 70 ft in front of the car and about 120 ft in the air there was a disc shaped object hovering in front of us.We exited the vehicle and stood on top of the car,starring at this object in amazement .About 30 seconds later their was another car that pulled up behind us,the guy stepped out of his car and starred at the object. i was feeling confused,scared,and numb.No one said a word. i couldn't believe what was happening!The object made a very low sound like when you put your ear against an florescent light,and a very low humming noise.The object hovered in the same spot for roughly one minute,it started to move very slow off the street,and started heading towards the trees.All of a sudden the large ufo vanished!We ran into the car and drove to our parents house,we ran out the car to the front door and knocking hard to get in.When my mother opened the door we almost knocked her down. i was crying,confused,and thinking that something was going to happen to us and the world.We ran and closed all the blinds and windows and hide in a room.We were looking out the window to see if the object was going to return. i was thirteen years old when this occurred,and never really told anyone about this event until i hit my late 20's,and now i can't forget what happened that day and i tell as many people as possible about that night,everybody feels as if i am making this story up,but i am willing to take a lie dector test and to be hpynized so i can relive this amazing event that happened to me.I was watching a eposide of the ufo files and they talked about mufon and i was hoping that i could dicuss with someone this event that they would undersand,believe and not think this was some type of joke. thank you for allowing me to express that amazing night.
content.summary: Disc shaped object with one large white light in the center,white ligths around the edges,glass windows without the whole center.

content.detailedDescription:
About an hour of pleasant discourse ...A gift from the woman to my very psychic lady friend.
 many questions answered over a very pleasant hour of scientific conversation! 

obviously earth is in danger  soon due to 3 days of darkness created by nemisis now nearing our sun at 3.5 miles per second.  ( followed by over 7 years of famine due to intense freezing following the 3 days of occlusion!   this apparently happens every  ~6000 years time frame!  there soon will be multiple "pickups" of about 15 billion earth denizens now being "tagged" with locator beacons in the legs! ( since 1983) 
(also  monthly scans of hard-drive sourced information in both ears  about every 3 or 4 weeks!)   

there are some still who get very angry about the subject. i have met several locally!  their loss no doubt?  sincerely!  dr. b-ob1 ph.D ( aerospace consultant retired)
content.summary: Actual physical visit from 4th dimensional  woman and 2 men!

content.detailedDescription:
Was sleeping in my room.  i was almost ten years old.  i woke up and observed two small figures standing in my room.  they were dark and silloutted and appeared to be about 4 feet tall with large heads and large eyes.

i observed them for about 30 minutes.  

they were shadowy looking and i could not make out much detail, being that it was night time and dark in my room.

they appeared intelligent and aware of me.

they stood about 20 feet from me, and appeared to "talk" to one another silently as i watched.  the did not make any sound but made gestures and movements with their arms which insinuated animation and intelligence.  sometimes they pointed at me, and they also shook their heads in various expressions which were undiscernable to me.  

i was relatively calm at the time but fearful after they left.
content.summary: Two unidentified humanoid bodies

content.detailedDescription:
While bicycling home from work, in the costa mesa area, traveling south bound on the sana ana river trail, i approached a bridge, constructed by the army core of ingineers.

here i rested for a few minutes.

it was a clear night, and i happened to look up and observe what first appeared to me to be two moons in the sky.

for several seconds i pondered what i was seeing, and then eventually realised that what i was seeing was the moon and a reflection of the moon off of an unknown and invisible object.

it was then that i realsed that there was a black shape, based on the sillouette of stars, in the same area as the reflection.

by observing, i could see that the object was moving very slowly, almost hovering.

as the moon's reflection passed along the outer edge of the craft i could momentarily make out some detail - that the craft did have a distinct edge and appeared disk like.

i would estimate the size of the craft to quite large; over 200 feet in diameter.

i would estimate the distance from me to be less than 1500 feet but more than a 1000 feet.

i would estimate it's elevation to be somewhere between 1000 and 1500 feet.

i was along and somewhat isolated at the time of the event, but not feel fearful at first.

after the reflection of the moon passed over the edge of the craft, it was more difficult to "see" the craft - being that it was only a dark shape that "absorbed" some of the stars, and being in a somewhat star-less location, this rendered the craft almost totally undetectable.

at this time i got spooked and left the location.
content.summary: Large unidentified object hovering over location

content.detailedDescription:
While on a drive to las vegas, nevada from orange county, california via car with three other witnesses in the car.

we stopped at a rest stop in nevada a couple hours drive west of las vegas.  

the driver of the car, as well as two other witnesses observed a large unidentified flying object hovering over our location.

it is difficult to estimate the elevation of the craft or its approximate size.

it had no lights, nor other observable markings.  the craft seemed to be "invisible" and what we observed was a dark object that silhouetted stars and such as it moved slowly almost hovering over our location.

we observed the object for nearly a half hour, before becoming spooked and leaving the location.
content.summary: Large unidentified object hovering over car

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately may of 1994.  i was home alone, when at approximately 11pm to midnight there appeared in my bedroom (where i was) two unidentified flying objects.

they were quite luminous and bright red.  they appeared to be emitting their own light.  they were spherical, and approximately the equal diameter of a u.S. nickel.

they moved quickly throughout the room; much quicker than any type of an insect or even a bird.  there movements appeared to me to be thoughtful, and indicative of intelligent beings.

they were aware of me, or so i thought.

i don't remember exactly how long they were there before they attempted to communicate.

i was not afraid, but rather seemed calm and intrigued.  i don't think this would have been my natural reaction.  i think that somehow they were able to prevent me from getting to fearful or excited.

at some point, i heard a telepathic communication (inside of my head) that they wanted to communicate.

they specifically used the word "commune" which i thought had religious connotations at the time.

they said, "we want to commune... with you."

a few moments later one of the object came around on my left side and entered my left ear.  i could feel that the object was physical.

for the next few minutes (not sure how long) i heard what i perceived to be multiple high-pitched voices inside of my ear.  i was unable to discern anything specifically that was communicated.

i am also not sure how long this took place.

i think that i went into a trance of some sort, durring the majority of this "communication" and don't remember more than a few minutes of it.

i estimate that i came out of the trance a couple of hours later.  the two light-emitting red objects were still in my vicinity.

i went to bed, and went to sleep and did not see them the next day.

however, that night, one of the objects appeared in my room again, momentarily, before exiting the room, {apparently} by entering a fluorescent light tube that was turned off at the time.

i have not seen them since, and although at the time of the event i regarded this as an extra-terrestrial event.  because this experience differed from the common descriptions of close encounters that i was aware of, i was reluctant to report the event at the time that it occurred.

recently i was reading a book called the watchers by ray fowler, which indicated that a lot of reports are atypical of the "common" ufo report, especially contact reports.

i perhaps would never have reported this event for i am not looking for publicity or anything like that but through the years i realise that i have no idea what or who these things were, what their intention was, or what (if anything) they did and for what reasons?

in short, i have no clue-- and i would like to know.

i felt that in reporting this event that perhaps you may be aware in your investigations of similar experiences that others have had, and i may be able to learn more about these many questions that i have about the event.
content.summary: Two luminescent unidentified flying objects appear in my home and make contact
